a = [0]
s = 'M'
n = int(input())
a.extend(list(map(int, input().split())))
s = s + input()
a_part_sorted = sorted(a[1:])
a[1:] = a_part_sorted
r = n
l = 1
ans = [0] * (n + 1)
for i in range(n, 0, -1):
    if s[i] == s[i - 1]:
        ans[i] = l
        l = l + 1
    else:
        ans[i] = r
        r = r - 1
for i in range(1, n + 1):
    print(a[ans[i]], ' ' + 'R' if ans[i] & 1 ^ n & 1 ^ (s[n] == 'R') else 'L')
